title: Navel Power - Kundalini Yoga w/ Ravi Singh & Ana Brett DVDRi
description:
In this 75 min. DVD, celebrated Yoga Teachers, Ravi Singh & Ana Brett, will help you develop a stomach of steel and the ability to command your own Destiny!
Ravi & Ana's Yoga DVD's are designed to cover every aspect necessary to bring balance to your mind, health, and emotions and imbue your life with inspiration and fearlessness. The Navel Center or 'fire in the belly,' is the key to success, focus, patience, and energy to burn! The Navel Center is also our rejuvenative capacity. A strong navel helps us to put back the energy we put out every day.

This conveniently chaptered workout, designed to help you structure a workout to fit any schedule, features a warm-up set, stretching, and an invigorating, comprehensive Kundalini Yoga set for abdominal strengthening and toning, core strength development, improved digestion, and prosperity. Also Included: a deep relaxation and a moving meditation to help your life flow. Features superb production values and an inspiring soundtrack including a mantra meditation sung by the renowned recording artist, Wah!
